403.label: Access denied
403.msg: Admin rights are mandatory for access. Contact the admins!

404.label: Page not found
404.msg: Sorry, but the page you are looking for can not be found. Check the URL for errors, refresh the page

500.label: Internal server error
500.msg: The server found something unexpected that could not complete the request. We apologize, you can go back to the main page

maintenance.label: Maintenance busy
maintenance.msg: Wait for or check out status with the admins

loginscreen.subtext: Log in to see it in action.

password_modal.first_time_text: This is the first time you logged in.
password_modal.first_time_subtext: You must change your password to a password you have chosen yourself. This is to ensure the security of your account.

csrf.label: CSRF token not valid
csrf.msg: Refresh the page and try again

blc.label: Error
blc.msg: User account is blocked. Contact the administrator.

mul.label: Token request failed
mul.msg: Can not request multiple tokens. Please wait till the current token has expired

err.label: Reset token request failed
err.msg: Refresh the page and try again

inv.label: Token is invalid
inv.msg: Refresh the page and request a new token

uknw.label: Token not found
uknw.msg: Refresh the page and request a new token

exp.label: Token expired
exp.msg: This is no longer usable. Refresh the page and request a new token

err.label: Password update failed
err.msg: Refresh the page and request a new token

notsend.label: There is a problem with sending the email
notsend.msg: Refresh the page and request a new token

err_email.label: Something went wrong
err_email.msg: This is not a correct email address

err_email_in_use.label: Something went wrong
err_email_in_use.msg: This email address is already in use

err.label: Something went wrong
err.msg: Refresh the page and try again
